text: @CNN He has been so amazingly wrong in his predictions, that’s the only consistent thing. That they’re wrong. Again and again. If you trust the President on coronavirus strategy, it is misplaced. He doesn’t have a clue, and he doesn’t give a damn. I hope he doesn’t pay for .it
